name: write_file
description: Write or update a project file. Creates the file if it does not exist, or overwrites if it does. Requires KB write password. Blocked: .env, .git/, credentials, binary files, paths outside project root.

file_path.description: Relative path within the project (e.g., 'docs/notes.md', 'config/settings.json'). No '..' allowed.

content.description: Full text content to write to the file (UTF-8). Max 1 MB.
